Title: Dunder Mifflin Infinity (1)
Plot: Ryan returns to his old office and reveals his plan to bring technology to Dunder Mifflin. Michael and Dwight try to prove that the personal touch is better than technology. Meanwhile, Jim and Pam reveal their relationship to the rest of the office, Kelly attempts to reunite with Ryan, and Dwight and Angela's relationship continues to plummet.
GuestStars: John Ingle, Edward James Gage, Kevin Dorff
